name: Peakflo
headline: Bill.com for SE Asia
description:
Peakflo with its simple API and one-click ERP integrations, allows businesses to streamline their invoice-to-cash and procure-to-pay processes. 100+ companies, from scale-ups to enterprises, use Peakflo each to: 

 - Save 2000 man-hours/month on finance ops  
 - Get paid faster on customer invoices by 15-25 days 
 - Cut vendor bill payment time by 50% 
 - Automate three-way matching

founders.name: Saurabh Chauhan, Founder
founders.description: Peakflo | Rocket Internet | Daraz (Alibaba) | McKinsey & Co.

founders.name: Dmitry Vedenyapin, Founder
founders.description: Peakflo co-founder | ex-Airasia | PhD in CS/AI

generated_description:
**Peakflo Overview**

Founded in 2021 and based in Singapore, Peakflo is on a mission to become the go-to platform for financial operations in Southeast Asia, akin to what Bill.com accomplished in the U.S. With a robust product suite that leverages simple APIs and one-click ERP integrations, Peakflo streamlines the ever-complicated process of invoice-to-cash and procure-to-pay for businesses.

**Key Offerings and Impact**
Here’s a snapshot of what makes Peakflo stand out:

- **Automation**: Peakflo automates crucial financial processes, saving clients a staggering 2000 man-hours each month on finance operations.
- **Faster Payments**: Clients see customer invoice payments faster, reducing wait times by 15-25 days.
- **Efficiency in Vendor Payments**: The platform cuts vendor bill payment times by 50%, allowing companies to manage cash flow more effectively.
- **Three-Way Matching**: Automation of three-way matching simplifies vendor transactions significantly.

Over 100 companies, ranging from scale-ups to large enterprises, have integrated Peakflo into their operations. Its tools span across accounts payable, accounts receivable, and reimbursement management.

**Product Features**
Peakflo prides itself on a variety of sophisticated features:
- **Invoice-to-Cash Automation**: Simplifies invoicing processes and enhances tracking.
- **Procure-to-Pay Automation**: Streamlines purchasing and vendor payments.
- **Travel & Expense Management**: Allows for hassle-free travel reimbursements.
- **End-To-End Payment Automation**: Ideal for businesses handling large quantities of transactions.

You can explore more about their features and success stories at [Peakflo's website](https://peakflo.co).

**Success Stories**
Customer testimonials highlight significant improvements. For instance, Ninja Van shared that they can now collect payments 10-15 days faster on average. Similarly, InMobi reported improved efficiency in overdue days, while EverPlate benefited tremendously from task automation that reduced manually intensive work.

**Team and Vision**
Peakflo is powered by a team of 45 and counts on support from Y Combinator, which signifies robust backing and belief in its mission. The company is strategically positioned to redefine financial operations in SEA, emphasizing user-friendly experiences and effective integrations with tools that businesses already use.

**Conclusion**
For companies in Southeast Asia, Peakflo is redefining how finance operations are handled—making processes not just simpler but automated, allowing teams to focus on strategic growth instead of mundane operational tasks.
